ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: (OT) Easter Eggs again (Some spoilers!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: LoL, I used to hang around in highkeep and beg from Lucky the Beggar for giggles.  I could usually beg about 10cp from him before he would aggro and shout
ygData.messageBody:
LoL, I used to hang around in highkeep and beg from Lucky the Beggar for
giggles. I could usually beg about 10cp from him before he would aggro and
shout something like "I hate beggars!" and start punching me. I suppose I
am easily amused but it made me laugh every time.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 10:47 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Re: (OT) Easter Eggs again (Some
> spoilers!!!)
>
>
> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 10:28 AM 3/3/00 -0600, you wrote:
> >From: "Jeremy Mueller" <jmueller@...>
> >
> >Just remembered this one....go to South Ro and sing Lullaby
> to a Desert
> >Madman. When he sleeps, he'll say something like "Could I have some
> >coffee?" (it's a sound) or very similar (in a very polite
> "Grey Poupon"
> >way :).
>
>
> All "Beggar" models (including the madmen) say "Might I have
> some coppers,
> please?"
>
> It is nice, but since it's the only voice in the game, it's a bit
> disturbing the first time you hear it.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
>
